titleStmt.title: A most delightful history of the famous clothier of England, called Jack of Newbery ... written by W.S.
titleStmt.author: W. S., 17th cent.
Deloney, Thomas, 1543?-1600.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H.B. for W. Thackeray,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages faded and tightly bound with loss of print.
Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Thomas Deloney.
Reproduction of original in the Magdalene College Library, Cambridge University.
